name: Santa Claus VR
description:
Here is the latest Virtal Reality Adventure Christmas game. We are looking for the bravest this season!

+ Have both VR and non VR mode
+ Immersive Virtual Reality experience
+ 360-degree view
+ High quality graphics

Good kids stay at home and wait for Santa Claus but you do not. You're going to do something CRAZY like breaking into the Santa 's house to steal the presents. We don't know what would happend when Santa Clause found you. Be careful and try to collect as many gifts and coins as posible. This game contains some horror thing such as blood, screaming...

If you want to experience more, check other VR apps from Vulcan Labs.

Let's keep playing!
